title: The Iced hopes of Dr Calastein
creator_credit: Bruce Currie, Hobart Hughes and Sydney Filmmakers Co-operative
brief_description: Calestein returns to his underground laboratory to continue work on his beloved virus. A day not unlike any other and yet today is different. Somehow things have gone to far, and those outside and above think its time to have a few words with Dr Calestein.
creator_credit_for_label: Bruce Currie, Hobart Hughes and Sydney Filmmakers Co-operative
